hard_constraints.description: For any valid partition, the arithmetic summation of the elements contained within subset 'a' must be precisely equivalent to the arithmetic summation of the elements contained within subset 'b'.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: total(a, S) :- S = #sum{ A : a(A) }. total(b, S) :- S = #sum{ B : b(B) }. :- total(a, S1), total(b, S2), S1 != S2.
